value:
$b005_CastleSideForest|$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face|Hm-hm-hmh-ha-hah... All these
mortals seem to be enjoying their
time here... So happy they are...$k$pNo better than Askr himself... You
fawn over other worlds, but you cast
me aside... How you must love it...$k$p$EFace_Smile|That is why you must be closed off,
closed in...so you can go nowhere...
Hm-hm-hmh-ha-HAH!$k$p$bEvBg_ConnectBondsOpening01|$Fo2000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...This world was, until recently, a hub
of thriving community between many
worlds, just as your Askr is now...$k$p$EFace_Pain|But now it has been closed away
by the dreadful power of Embla's
all-consuming darkness.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|So, even in this world, Embla has
come to spread suffering...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Isn't there a way we can help?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|There is. Embla is not now in this
world; she has left it unattended.
Thus, we are afforded an opening.$k$pLord Askr has graciously offered us
his protection here. We must use this
moment to clear away the darkness.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|All right then. Then there's no time
to waste! Let's go!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Oh! Before we set off, there is one
more thing that I must first tell you.$k$pLord Askr has generously placed
gates throughout this world.$k$pThese divine gates are locations
where many worlds meet—and you
can meet the Heroes of those worlds.$k$pHeroes you meet there can lend you
their power. So it would be wise to
reach out and let them aid you!$k$p
